nodes.description: Salman Abedi于2017年5月18日至22日期间携带蓝色大行李箱在曼彻斯特街道活动
nodes.support_text: Hours before he set off a bomb believed to be hidden in a backpack, Manchester Arena suicide attacker Salman Abedi walked city streets toting a bright blue suitcase.

nodes.description: 警方于2017年5月22日发布Abedi携行李箱照片并公开调查请求
nodes.support_text: Greater Manchester Police on Monday released two photos and asked for the public's help in their investigation of the May 22 attack.

nodes.description: 警方确认行李箱曾在至少两个曼彻斯特社区出现
nodes.support_text: Police said the attacker had the suitcase in at least two Manchester neighborhoods.

nodes.description: 警方声明行李箱内容无危险但提醒公众保持警惕
nodes.support_text: 'We have no reason to believe the case and its contents contain anything dangerous, but would ask people to be cautious,' said Jackson.
Hours before he set off a bomb believed to be hidden in a backpack, Manchester Arena suicide attacker Salman Abedi walked city streets toting a bright blue suitcase.

nodes.description: Salman Abedi在曼彻斯特竞技场炸弹袭击中造成22人死亡
nodes.support_text: The suicide bombing at Manchester Arena killed 22 people.

edges.support_text: Hours before he set off a bomb believed to be hidden in a backpack, Manchester Arena suicide attacker Salman Abedi walked city streets toting a bright blue suitcase.
同一段落中'Abedi walked city streets toting a bright blue suitcase'与'set off a bomb'存在明确的before时序关系
Police said the attacker had the suitcase in at least two Manchester neighborhoods.
'We have no reason to believe the case and its contents contain anything dangerous, but would ask people to be cautious,' said Jackson.
炸弹爆炸（node_5）与死亡事件（node_6）存在直接的因果关系和时间顺序
